name: PerfectMatch
0:
”Alexa, start perfect match”
”Alexa, open perfect match”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: perfect match
des: How well do you know your other half? In this party game for friends or couples, players pair up, and Alexa quizzes each player on how well they know their partner. The partner judges the responses.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
